Occupation History:
Having worked for over 38 years, Rizzo Marino Romano brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Rizzo Marino Romano began his professional journey as a Art Dealer at Pinacoteca di Brera in 1987, laying the foundation for future success.

His tenure as a Art Advisor at Galleria degli Uffizi from 1996 to 1998 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He appointment as a Curator at Galleria Borghese in 1998 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Rizzo Marino Romano concluded his career as a Museum Director at Galleria degli Uffizi, where he worked from 2005 until retirement.
